name: InHome Delivery
info: A delivery service that uses smart locks and garage openers to enable Walmart associates to deliver groceries directly to a customer's fridge. Deliveries are live-streamed from an associate's vestcam for customer peace of mind.

name: Smart Pill Bottle & App
info: A Bluetooth pill bottle that automatically tracks doses and beeps when a dose is missed. The bottle communicates with an app via Bluetooth and can warn a user if they've already taken a dose.

name: Jam
info: Cooperative music curation and discovery app that uses Bluetooth to identify nearby users and machine learning to build real-time playlists to incorporate everyone's tastes.

name: Dots
info: Webapp that will aggregate recent Facebook photo tags and build a visualization of social relationships.

name: MyTime
info: An application for the University which helps students stay more organized by linking Google services with existing university schedule data.

name: Kaffee
info: A new way to visualize the popularity and locations of local businesses.

name: Mustard
info: A real-time note-taking app that allows a group of students to take notes together during class.

name: Artichoke Editor
info: Online code editor that allows a group of users to program and video chat simultaneously. The project was intended as a solution for college coding projects or interviews.

name: Smart Boots
info: Lead a research project at Michigan, working with MIT Lincoln Lab. Developing suite of gait and weight analysis algorithms and custom Bluetooth hardware.
